title: Man in critical condition after accidental shooting
content:
A 25-year-old man is in critical condition, after an early-morning accidental shooting Saturday.
Authorities said the incident occurred in the 8300 block of Whipporwill Drive, before the victim was transported to Community Hospital North just before 7:30 a.m.
"This was not a criminal act," said Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Department spokesman James Gillespie.
He said IMPD will not pursue any suspects in the case.
